name: locksmart-api
description: API client for the Dog & Bone LockSmart service

scripts.lint:license: node-license-validator . --allow-licenses Apache BSD BSD-3-Clause BSD-4-Clause ISC MIT --allow-packages locksmart-api extsprintf@1.0.2 'tweetnacl@0.13.3||0.14.3' verror@1.3.6 --production --deep
scripts.lint: npm run lint:src && npm run lint:license
